subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|無|舛|t2=steps|ls=psc|c1=p|c2=s}}. A specific character for the dance sense of {{l|zh|無}}. See {{l|zh|無}} for more.

subSections.title: Compounds
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|まい}}

# a type of traditional Japanese dance consisting of simple and quiet movements
